Discourse Forum

11 Aug 2017

We’ve noticed that there are many questions raised as issues on GitHub, so we’ve installed a Discourse forum at https://forum.restic.net! For now, this is an experiment to see if a forum is better suited to answer questions. We’ll see how that goes.

Please let us know any feedback you have (in the forum, obviously)!
